laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Fluctuated between 75th and 95th percentile until 24 months

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Developmental assessment (Mullen Scales of Early Learning)
laboratory_examinations.findings: Scores within average range for nonverbal problem-solving skills (14-month level), fine (15-month level), and gross motor (16-month level). Significant delays in receptive (5-month level) and expressive language (9-month level).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Minimal changes, with some progress in nonverbal cognitive functioning (23 months at 23-month level), growing from 14 to 23 months

laboratory_examinations.findings: High scores in daily living (14-month level) and motor skills (17-month level). Significant delays (communication at 10-month level and socialization at 9-month level).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Minimal absolute progress in adaptive skills at 23 months with drop in standard scores
Scores virtually unchanged at 23 months and 34 months
